name: TakeaChance
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: From Immigration Attorney Jim Hacking comes Take A Chance, a daily briefing feed that will help you stay motivated and maximize your potential, regardless of what you do.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
